venue.name: edgewood park tennis courts New Haven

item.description:
A number of folks who classify themselves as beginners are members of the Meetup. These folks have checked in recently: Deena Artist, Marjorie Wren, Liv, Jill, Coleen, Patty Meglio and Susan.

I encourage you to contact each other and get out and play. Of course better weather would help too!

group.name: Tennis Meetup of New Haven and Fairfield Counties

item.name: "Beginners" getting together to play
